description.english: Evolve after being reduced to less than 10% of core integrity.
Use every form of propulsion across an entire run.
Reprogram a trap using a Datajack.

displayName.english: It Was An Accident, I Swear

description.english: Destroy 10 machines in a single turn.
Use a melee weapon to dig through 10 walls or earth.
Attack 5 Recyclers attempting to collect parts.
Attach or use an alien artifact.

displayName.english: Maybe Next Time I'll Detach My Launcher

description.english: Escape a Stasis Trap with help from an explosion.
Open a locked door by destroying its Terminal with an electromagnetic weapon.
Hit 2 robots with a single projectile.
Destroy 5 hostiles via explosions in a single turn.
Knock a hostile robot into an exploding machine via melee impact damage.
Sneak attack a Watcher and destroy it in one hit.
Melee attack a hostile using 4 momentum.
Destroy 2 hostiles with one melee volley.
Attempt to fire a matter-consuming volley without enough matter.
Shoot down a launcher projectile with a defensive utility.
Destroy a Saboteur before it succeeds.
Use a Fabricator to destroy an enemy.
Fire a launcher at an enemy at point blank range.
Be spotted by an Operator that then summons reinforcements from its Terminal.
Trigger an investigation by being traced to a Terminal.
Cause a robot to call for help or reinforcements from a nearby Garrison.
Cause 3 active investigation squads at once.
Raise alert high enough to trigger an assault dispatch.
Go from being tracked by 10 hostiles to having no pursuers without destroying any of them.
Repair a part via Repair Station.
Use an Operator Data Core before it expires.
Lower alert using a Terminal's Purge Threat hack.
Use a Terminal to recall an active squad.
Hack Hauler Manifests at a Terminal.
Reset a hostile robot using the reboot_system hack.
Cause a hostile robot's power to go critical with an overload_power or amplify_resonance hack.
Assimilate a hostile robot using the format_system hack.
Jam 10 distress signals or other communications.
Use an Imp. Sensor Array (or better) with Imp. Signal Interpreter (or better).
Use an Imp. Terrain Scanner (or better) with Imp. Terrain Scan Processor (or better).
Reach a speed of FASTx3, or 4 spaces per turn.
Fly over a row of 3 robots.
Have +40% targeting accuracy for ranged weapons via utilities.
Fire 10 kinetic projectiles in a single volley.
Destroy 3 robots with a single volley using secondary targeting.
Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by guns.
Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by cannons.
Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by launchers.
Destroy 100 hostiles with at least 90% of damage dealt by melee weapons.
Trigger reprogrammed (or placed) traps on 30 hostiles.
Move with 4 overloaded hover or flight units.
Reach a speed of 10 spaces per turn.
Reach a speed of 20 spaces per turn.
Destroy a visible hostile from more than 20 spaces away with a gun or cannon.
With no hostiles in sight and no pursuers, destroy an enemy combat bot with explosives.
Obtain 50 pieces of intel from one or more 0b10 Decoder Chips.
Succeed at 10 hacks on a single Terminal.
Succeed at 3 manual hacks on a single Terminal.
Acquire 75 allies across an entire run.
Oversee 75 ally kills across an entire run.
Discover the use of Self-destruct Interrupters.
Destroy a robot via core entropy.
Inflict 200 damage against an enemy with one shot from a single weapon.
Instakill an enemy with a Core Stripper.
Destroy 200 walls with area of effect damage.

displayName.english: I Think I Know What's Going On

description.english: Achieve a kill streak of 20 hostiles.
Destroy a visible ARC before it deploys.
Destroy all Cetus Guards without any help from allies.
Enter a main complex map at -5 or above as a naked core, and find an exit (do not have to remain naked).
Achieve a kill streak of 35 hostiles.
Inflict 30,000 thermal damage across an entire run.
Inflict 30,000 electromagnetic damage across an entire run.
Inflict 30,000 kinetic damage across an entire run.
Enter and survive 2 Garrisons on a single floor.
Enter a main complex map at -3 or above as a naked core with no inventory items, and find an exit (do not have to remain naked).
Kill at least 20 inhabitants of Zion.
Attach or use 15 different alien artifacts.
Enter a Garrison with below 10% core integrity and survive it.
Seal, jam, or destroy all Garrison Access machines in Access.
Destroy 100 robots in a single turn.
Earn 10,000 bonus points for high alert combat kills.
Destroy 4 Network Hubs and escape to the next floor.
Personally kill Warlord in his base and escape. Must initiate hostilities before incursion begins.
Wait in Scrapyard until something interesting happens.
Use the Behemoth hack given by the annoying Derelict.

displayName.english: That's One Door That Should Stay Closed

description.english: Use Data Miner's code to access Warlord Stash.
Get the Cetus Mainframe code from A7.
Get scanned by a Researcher in Section 7.
Hack MAIN.C with the Cetus Mainframe code.
Escape Warlord's base with the counterattack.
Find and enter the hidden Lab.
Hack God Mode using code from Data Miner.
Win and escape to Epsilon Eridani.
Win and rendezvous with the fleet.
Win and nuke Complex 0b10 from orbit.
Win and take control of Complex 0b10.
Win and destroy Tau Ceti IV.
Win and escape the artificial singularity.
Win after being scanned by a Researcher in Section 7.
Win after interfacing with the Data Conduit.
Win while only evolving utility slots.
Win without destroying a single robot.
Win with less than 5% of core integrity.
Win without attaching any propulsion except flight.
Win with 200 hostiles destroyed and without attaching any propulsion except wheels.
Win with 400 hostiles destroyed but no more than 4 utility slots.
Win after entering an Access garrison.
Win the Fragile Parts challenge mode.
Win the Inhibited Evolution challenge mode.
Win the No Salvage challenge mode.
Win the Pure Core challenge mode.
Win the Simple Hacker challenge mode.
Win the Sticky Parts challenge mode.
Win the Super Gauntlet challenge mode.
Win the Unstable Evolution challenge mode.
